pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ansys fork of `pythonnet <https://github.com/pythonnet/pythonnet>`_.We will try to keep this up-to-date with pythonnet and upstream changes that might benefit the pythonnet communityChanges relative to pythonnet:- Revert of `#1240 <https://github.com/pythonnet/pythonnet/pull/1240>`_.- Enum REPR `#2239 <https://github.com/pythonnet/pythonnet/pull/2239>` is included in this release of version 3.0.2, but is unreleased in pythonnet
